tool_description: Provide information about LEGO building instructions for selected LEGO sets. Each LEGO set building step in on separate picture. Available sets could be listed
name: cubiculus - LEGO building instructions
title: cubiculus - LEGO building instructions

api_list.name: Building Instruction
api_list.description: get concrete building instruction by id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cubiculusbi.p.rapidapi.com/building-instruction/131"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cubiculusbi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cubiculusbi.p.rapidapi.com/building-instruction/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cubiculusbi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Building Instructions List
api_list.description: get list of building instructions, field stepGroups in response is always empty. To get all details about building instruction method "Building instruction" should be used
api_list.code:

headers = {

print(response.json())
